original_text: The priest will look at the clothes after the people have washed them. If the mildew still seems the same, the people must not wear the clothes. The people must burn the clothes whether the mark is inside or outside them.
korean_text: 그 빤 곳을 볼지니 그 색점의 빛이 변하지 아니하고 그 색점이 퍼지지 아니하였으면 부정하니 너는 그것을 불사르라 이는 거죽에 있든지 속에 있든지 악성 나병이니라

sentences.original_text: The priest will look at the clothes
after the people have washed them
If the mildew still seems the same
the people must not wear the clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그 옷을 입어서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: The people must burn the clothes
whether the mark is inside or outside them
sentences.korean_translation: 그 자국이 안쪽에 있든 바깥쪽에 있든
